    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.pi4j.component.ObserveableComponentBase

        listeners

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GpioPowerComponent(GpioPinDigitalOutput pin)
      default constructor; using this constructor assumes that: (1) a pin state of HIGH is POWER ON (2) a pin state of LOW is POWER OFF
      GpioPowerComponent(GpioPinDigitalOutput pin, PinState onState, PinState offState)
      using this constructor requires that the consumer define the POWER ON and POWER OFF pin states

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Return the current power state based on the GPIO digital output pin state.

      Set the current GPIO digital output pin state based on the supplied power state

      • GpioPowerComponent

        public GpioPowerComponent(GpioPinDigitalOutput pin,
                          PinState onState,
                          PinState offState)
        using this constructor requires that the consumer define the POWER ON and POWER OFF pin states
        Parameters:
        pin - GPIO digital output pin
        onState - pin state to set when power is ON
        offState - pin state to set when power is OFF
